rewrite_iterations.rewritten_text: It sounds like you're really in a tough place right now, and those thoughts can be incredibly heavy. Are you feeling safe right now? It's really important to talk to someone who can support you, whether it's a trusted friend or a professional. If you need immediate help, please consider contacting someone or reaching out to crisis services at 1393, 1577-0199, or emergency services at 112/119. Also, try not to stay alone; connecting with someone can really help.
